Package peregrine.io.partition

Code for writing partition files which are automatically written to the correct hosts and split into chunks.

See:
          Description

Interface Summary
PartitionWriter Main PartitionWriter interface.
PartitionWriterDelegate Delegates performing the actual IO to a given subsystem.
 

Class Summary
BasePartitionWriterDelegate Write to a logical partition which is a stream of chunk files....
DefaultPartitionWriter Write a partition as a given stream of key/value pairs and rollover chunks as they are filled.
LocalPartition Write to a logical partition which is a stream of chunk files....
LocalPartitionReader Read data from a partition from local storage from the given file with a set of chunks.
LocalPartitionWriterDelegate Write to a logical partition which is a stream of chunk files.
PartitionWriterJobOutput JobOutput for writing directly to a partition on the FS either in a reduce or map-only or merge-only job.
RemotePartitionWriterDelegate Write to a logical partition which is a stream of chunk files....
 

Package peregrine.io.partition Description

Code for writing partition files which are automatically written to the correct hosts and split into chunks.
